channel.title: [HELP]Converting itemDef -> class8.anInt [HELP]

item.title: [HELP]Converting itemDef -> class8.anInt [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Sir_wootness Sir wootness
item.description:
@Sir_wootness wrote:

since no one else will help here you go. I’m pretty sure this is right i don’t mess with 317’s anymore but instead moved on to 508-525’s

if(i == 13789) {
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.anInt174 = 62694;
class8.anInt181 = 980;
class8.anInt190 = 0;
class8.anInt198 = 220;
class8.anInt169 = 0;
class8.anInt194 = -18;
class8.anInt165 = 62737;
class8.anInt200 = 62753;
class8.anInt164 = -1;
class8.anInt188 = -1;
class8.aBoolean176 = false;
class8.aString170 = “Ancient ceremonial hood”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “an ancient hood.”.getBytes();

}

if that doesn’t work try changing the item id number to replace something useless like a bronze med or something.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP]Converting itemDef -> class8.anInt [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @gaza20333 gaza20333
item.description:
@gaza20333 wrote:
